overview: The secluded Camp Blood was supposed to be the perfect place to spend the summer. But when six teenage counselors show up the terror begins. To their horror the find a deranged killer determined to pick them off one by one. Hormones, Illegal drugs, an catchy tuns form a recipe for death in... Camp Blood: The Musical.
tagline: It was supposed to be the summer of their lives... It became the summer of their deaths.
title: Camp Blood: The Musical
